summary: Standalone Conversion Of Sumarius Black Elven Armor and Weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Update > Nothing major, all armor is still the same just added a masked helmet, just overwrite the old version. :)

I did not create this skin all the REAL hardwork was done by Sumarius, i have simply made it a standalone, craftable and temperable version.

There should be no issues, works with all races.
A fine retex of the elven armor, and was the reason i learnt how to make armors standalone in the ck. 

Heres the original retex version > Black Elven Armor and Weapons
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3121

For Manual Install

Place Esp in > Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Place Textures And Meshes Into relevent folders

Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\armor\\royalelven
Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\armor\\royalelven

Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\weapons\\royalelven 
Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\weapons\\royalelven
author: zaph72
